suggest(String) - Method in class Suggestion
This uses the levenshtein distance between a wrong word and dictionary words to make spelling suggestions.

This class is used to make suggestions for incorrectly spelt words using a given dictionary as reference.

This constructs a Suggestion using a specified dictionary for reference.
